structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
A FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES

law.catch_line: Apportionment of cost of improvement for property owned by government or educational, religious or charitable organizations.
law.text: The cost of any improvement shall be apportioned on a benefits received basis with respect to any property owned by the state, a local unit of government or any educational, religious, or charitable organization. The legislative body of the city may assess such property in the same manner as for privately owned property or it may pay the costs so apportioned out of general revenues.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980.
